service_name: Sharepoint for Intranet (OFFICIAL-SENSITIVE) SharePoint Services, SharePoint Hosting
page_content:
Equiniti ICS Ltd.

Sharepoint for Intranet (OFFICIAL-SENSITIVE) SharePoint Services, SharePoint Hosting

SharePoint for Intranet from Equiniti offers huge capabilities for organisations. A SharePoint Intranet system enables teams to work together easily to share critical business information on SharePoint sites. Equiniti is offering a SharePoint 2013 package where organisations will receive a cost effective online basic intranet template.

Features

  • Flexibility to support ongoing business change
  • Compliant with industry regulations
  • Cost-effective way share and collaborate more effectively
  • Accesible from any location
  • Ensuring fast and efficient information retrieval
  • Improved team productivity

Benefits

  • Integration with workflow
  • Customisable SharePoint system
  • Social features
  • Creation of apps for SharePoint
  • Powerful search and retrieval mechanism
  • Single browser-based view that is individualised to a particular user

Pricing

£17550 to £17550 per instance

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial option available
